title: Increase the Minimum Quorum Requirement for Proposal Validity
summary: This proposal seeks to amend the minimum quorum requirement for the validity of governance proposals in EchoVote from the current 600,000 to 800,000 tokens. The goal of this change is to improve the legitimacy and representativeness of decisions made through the EchoVote governance system by ensuring a higher level of participation.

rationale.point_1: Increase the participation threshold: Raising the quorum ensures that proposals are approved by a broader and more engaged portion of the community, ensuring that decisions are more representative of the entire governance body.
rationale.point_2: Improve proposal quality: A higher quorum will likely encourage more active participation and higher-quality debate and deliberation on proposals, as it would require more commitment to reach the necessary threshold.
rationale.point_3: Maintain network integrity: This change will align EchoVote's governance mechanism with best practices from other decentralized organizations that have seen success with higher quorum requirements, leading to more robust and sustainable decision-making.

positive_effects: Ensures more community engagement in decision-making.
Reduces the likelihood of decisions being made with insufficient support or participation.
potential_risks_challenges: Potential for slower proposal approvals as a higher quorum may take longer to achieve.
Some proposals might fail to meet the quorum, potentially leading to delays in the implementation of important changes.
mitigating_measures: Engage the community more proactively to encourage participation in voting.
Ensure regular updates and reminders to token holders about upcoming votes and the importance of participating to meet the quorum.

voting_process.minimum_voting_threshold: A proposal will pass if it receives a majority vote, and the quorum requirement (800,000 tokens) is met.
voting_options: Approve the increase in quorum to 800,000 tokens.
Reject the increase in quorum (keep it at 600,000 tokens).
